import React from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' export default function About() { const {API} = useContext() return (
{API.map((item, index) => (
  • DelData(item._id)} class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-red-600 hover:bg-gray-100 dark:hover:bg-gray-600 dark:text-gray-200 dark:hover:text-white"> | Delete
{item.fullname}
{item.email}
WhatApp Email
))}
) }
